---
title: details
---

# fl-details

This is a details component meant for use analagous to that of an html details tag.

## Examples 

 <!--Some Tag Examples-->
 <fl-details summary="Summary title goes here">
     More info woo!!
 </fl-details>


 <fl-details>
     <h1 slot="summary">i go in the summary slot</h1>
     More info in here!
 </fl-details>

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property   | Attribute  | Description                                       | Type      | Default     |
| ---------- | ---------- | ------------------------------------------------- | --------- | ----------- |
| `disables` | `disables` | Disables component                                | `boolean` | `false`     |
| `open`     | `open`     | Opens the component if set to true                | `boolean` | `false`     |
| `summary`  | --         | Can be used to set a pure text summary using text | `String`  | `undefined` |


----------------------------------------------
